file_content.text: We're understanding more about the Flesh Raiders every day. Thank you.
I examined the Flesh Raiders' idols. Here are my findings.
Interesting. According to these markings... it's like the Flesh Raiders see us as animals.
I'll inform Master Wix and the Council at once. With more research, we may finally understand the creatures' motivations and restore peace to Tython.
Thank you, Padawan. I sense a great future for you in the order.
My Padawan would thank you if she could. Instead, you have my gratitude.
Find the Flesh Raiders' idols, and be careful. I cannot lose another to their jaws.
The Force is strong with you, but don't think you're invincible.
Like you, my Padawan showed great talent. She was strong-willed, thoughtful... such potential.
Congratulations, Jedi. It seems like just the other day you came to Tython to study the Force.
My Padawan would be a Jedi, too, by now. She showed great talent, wisdom... such potential.
She would've served the order well, but the Flesh Raiders extinguished her life. I sensed her final moments--terror, agony... then nothing.
The Flesh Raiders will continue to feed on Jedi until we stop them.
We must end their attacks.
That's precisely what I'm striving to do.
Something stronger than hunger must be forcing the Flesh Raiders' hand.
Why would they attack?
I wish I knew, but I believe we're close to an answer.
A great loss, I'm sure.
Thank you. I'm taking measures to prevent other Jedi from sharing my Padawan's fate.
The Flesh Raiders mustn't get away with this senseless slaughter.
This won't stand!
Don't give in to anger. There are other solutions.
If we understand the Flesh Raiders' culture, what motivates their violence, we may yet forge peace.
Unfortunately our emissaries are met with aggression. The latest team fled, but not before witnessing strange idols in the Flesh Raiders' camp.
Do these idols fuel the creatures' rage? What do the Flesh Raiders gain from their worship? To know, someone truly brave must examine the idols.
The Flesh Raiders' motivations will soon be known to the Jedi.
I will investigate the idols.
I would shield you from the Flesh Raiders, but this task is too vital.
How will studying their culture help us?
What's the use?
Every insight into Flesh Raider society brings us closer to quieting their hunger. But we need aid.
Inspect the idols and record your findings. Stare into the face of what they value most, and ignore no detail, however trivial.
Once you're done, give the data to myself or Master Wix, my ally in this cause. He's attending to the Pilgrims in Kalikori village.
You do it. [Refuse quest]
I've tried and failed. For now I can only study the Flesh Raiders from afar and mourn their victims.
What drives the Flesh Raiders? What feeds their hunger?
